title: HDE 3-in-1 Multifunction Touch Screen Stylus Flashlight Ball Point Pen for Capacitive Electronic Devices (4 Pack) (Black, Silver, Red, Blue)
feature: 3-in-1 capacitive stylus, LED flashlight, and ballpoint pen
Capacitive stylus compatible with most touch screen tablets, smartphones, and other devices
Stylus prevents fingerprint smudges and more accuracy than using your fingers
Ballpoint pen extends from rubber tip for convenient writing toolInk color: blue
Bright LED flashlight provides excellent reading light or emergency light source
description: Reduce desktop clutter with this 3-in-1 stylus, pen, and LED flashlight perfect for any professional tablet user. The soft rubber tip works with all capacitive touch screens and allows for easy navigation, note-taking, and drawing with greater accuracy and less fingerprints. The super-bright LED flashlight helps you see into those dark corners of your office or when the power goes out. The rubber tip also turns into a ballpoint pen, so you can sign important documents or scribble down information on that most ancient of note-taking tools: paper!
